text: Darryl Wade Worley (born October 31, 1964) is an American country music singer and songwriter. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Hard Rain Don't Last (2000) * I Miss My Friend (2002) * Darryl Worley (2004) * Here and Now (2006) * Sounds Like Life (2009) ==Other websites== * Official Site Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Country musicians Category:Singers from Memphis, Tennessee Category:Country musicians from Tennessee
title: Darryl Worley
